oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cumberland River land grant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Land grant (#297) giving Robert Searcy, assignee of Martin Armstrong, Dyers Island in the Cumberland River, 1796.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Revolutions; Land grants
United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783; Cumberland River (Ky. and Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dyers Island was located in what is now Stewart County, Tennessee.
